subsection_content:
What are the signs of snoring? People who snore will make vibrating, rattling, and noisy sounds when breathing.
MSc.BSc.CKI Nguyen Thi Huong said that in patients with sleep apnea, there may be other symptoms of snoring such as:
Often stop breathing, startle awake when sleeping; (1); Drowsiness during the day;; Morning headache;; Weight gain;; Waking up in the morning tired and sluggish;; Waking up in the middle of the night;; Don't concentrate during the day.
subsection_data:
ngu ngay.json. Signs of snoring
What are the signs of snoring? People who snore will make vibrating, rattling, and noisy sounds when breathing.
MSc.BSc.CKI Nguyen Thi Huong said that in patients with sleep apnea, there may be other symptoms of snoring such as:
Often stop breathing, startle awake when sleeping; (1); Drowsiness during the day;; Morning headache;; Weight gain;; Waking up in the morning tired and sluggish;; Waking up in the middle of the night;; Don't concentrate during the day.
